treksJson.name: Surya Top Trek
treksJson.attractions: Lush, evergreen and deciduous forests & Flowering meadows
treksJson.description: Surya Top is located at a height of 4,200 metre above the sea level. This peak offers the most panoramic view of the mighty Himalayan range and its surrounding peaks. The itinerary has been designed in a way that will cover most of the profound trekking destinations in the entire region. In order to provide all the fun, thrill and excitement of trekking, destinations in this trip have been handpicked by the local trekking experts.While trekking in this route, the trekker will come across various lush, evergreen and deciduous forests. Flowering meadows are one of the major attractions of this tour. This trekking trip will surely bring the trekkers, closer to the beautiful and enchanting nature.
